attributes.action: Allowing adults to choose if they want to play violent games e.g Manhunt 2
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that the goverment can even choose what adults can do, even gaming.
surly it is up to the indiviual to choose if they want to play violent games, they are giving an 18 rating for a reasion, a child can get hold of a horror film, or see people get blown up on the news. people have been playing these type of games for years as have I. My mind is not worped in any way.
MY point is to let us have that choice. What is next the banning of horror the news or even tom and jerry oh and farie tales, just look at some of them, wolfs trying to eat a child, step mother attemting to murder her step child and so on.
LET US HAVE A CHOICE !

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
